page.title: 10GOREY HARBOUR.
page.content: Gorey harbour is a lively and friendly place, with its little fishing boats and yachts. It is one of the most popular places where lots of holiday-makers visit. It has a wide variety of sea-birds, ranging from herring-gulls to oyster-catchers, and there are lots of locals trying a spot of fishing. Gorey harbour also has its own cafes, shops and restaurants which are much praised for their shellfish, including crabs, lobsters, oysters, mussels and langoustines. There are coach tours, visits to Mont Orgueil Castle, and at night time it is a pleasure to see the castle completely floodlit and the lights of the shops and houses reflecting in the water.
